description.oldValue:
,Before you move any site or list from SharePoint Server on-premises into Microsoft 365, it's best practice to assess content and plan for the migration. The SharePoint Migration Tool (SPMT) will provide content assessment so cloud admins can best understand what content they have, decide what to migrate, and what to remediate. In this update, SPMT supports SharePoint Server migration assessment for versions 2010, 2013, 2016 and 2019.
GA date: June CY2023
Preview date: December CY2022
